Package org.hibernate.testing.orm.junit

Annotation Interface SessionFactory

@Inherited @Target({TYPE,METHOD}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @TestInstance(PER_CLASS) @ExtendWith(FailureExpectedExtension.class) @ExtendWith(ServiceRegistryExtension.class) @ExtendWith(ServiceRegistryParameterResolver.class) @ExtendWith(DomainModelExtension.class) @ExtendWith(DomainModelParameterResolver.class) @ExtendWith(SessionFactoryExtension.class) @ExtendWith(SessionFactoryParameterResolver.class) @ExtendWith(SessionFactoryScopeParameterResolver.class) public @interface SessionFactory
